    • Uses of EntityViewFactory in com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views

      Classes in com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views that implement EntityViewFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConfigurablePropertiesEntityViewFactorySupport<V extends ViewCreationContext,T extends EntityView>
      Extends the SimpleEntityViewFactorySupport with support for configuring a set of properties that should be rendered for a given entity type.
      class  EntityDeleteViewFactory<V extends ViewCreationContext>
      Creates the delete form for an entity.
      class  EntityFormViewFactory<V extends ViewCreationContext> 
      class  EntityListViewFactory<V extends ViewCreationContext>
      Handles a list of items (entities) with support for the properties to show, paging, sorting and configuring the sortable properties.
      class  EntityViewViewFactory
      Base implementation for viewing properties of a single entity.
      class  SimpleEntityViewFactorySupport<V extends ViewCreationContext,T extends EntityView>
      Base support class for EntityViewFactory implementations that supports the following features: template specification message source and message code resolving custom entity link builders custom view processors for customizing the view generation
      class  SingleEntityViewFactory<V extends ViewCreationContext,T extends EntityView>
      Simple implementation of ConfigurablePropertiesEntityViewFactorySupport that builds the view elements in the mode specified, for the properties configured.
